report.title: Qualitative Description
report.author: Alexander Shulgin
report.bodytext: /n /n /n /n end image-surround /n /n /n Qualitative Description: TMA-2 /n /n Dose: 12mg + 1mg = 13mg /n /n Date: Sunday May 30, 1976: 11:40 = 0.00 - no EtOH for 5 months /n /n 1:10 Onset of first threshold effects - slight nausea - probably coincidence - but numbing of 4-5th fingers of the left hand. But these fingers have been troublesome (Right hand too) and are often asleep on awaking in mornings. /n /n 3:00 Really pleasant, with-nature euphoria. Sat behind lab on steps in the sun how often I have been apprehensive in a drug using that some emergency or other crisis might occur requiring sane logical action, and would I be able to respond adequately - but I here realize that if a fire, strange person, insect- were to threaten - then, and only then, do I need to consider the situation -so- until then enjoy - I did. /n /n This was in especial contrast to yesterday's study on DMT - perhaps I was so attentive to the possibility of some falling-down-stoned response, that I neglected to be receptive to a true altered state of consciousness - without perceptual change, without pretentious impact, without the LSD impact or the DMT physical aspects. /n /n I am completely convinced I would be able to handle 16 mg by myself and this as a full dose would quite accurately be 20 M.U. (with mescaline at 300 mg base - say 320 mg = exactly 20 M.U.). However, I would not care to pretend to be responding normally to a demanding world. /n /n 5:20 still with it. Tried to elicit visual distortion by going (1st time) into Cost Plus Imports in W. Creek. No such induction. Did a rather bad job of driving however. Had to pretend distractions. /n To 'All the Presidents Men' - with no clear visual distortion. I MUST REMEMBER - an ASC need not have visual disruption as a symptom!. /n /n 8:00 Drove to Berkely Farms for dinner with N & her mother. Still odd driving which N. commented on (What is the matter with you?). I had forgotten where the place was! Clearly emerging. On into evening without further events except a light sweatyness 10:00-12:00. Difficult (mental disturbance) in going to sleep /n /n This is a clear ASC process - perhaps valuable to describe (display) to a subject what this all is - without some annoying sensory modality demanding attention by misbehaving. Interesting day!!
